doc.summary: Tests whether a given object should be registered.
doc.text: Tests whether a given object should be registered. In order for an object to be registered, all conditions must return true.

doc.summary: A registry condition is used by the LibX registration system to prevent things passed to the  register methods from being registered.
doc.text: A registry condition is used by the LibX registration system to prevent things passed to the  register methods from being registered.
